text: Allsbrook is an unincorporated community in Horry County, in the U.S. state of South Carolina. ==History== An early variant name was "Sanford". A rail stop was located in the settlement.https://www.carolana.com/SC/Transportation/railroads/sc_rrs_wilmington_chadbourn_conway.html A post office called Allsbrook was established in 1915, and remained in operation until 1947. The present name is after N. B. Allsbrook and J. R. Allsbrook, brothers and first settlers. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in South Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in Horry County, South Carolina
title: Allsbrook, South Carolina
